overview: Mouth, anus, sphincters, round muscles closing our holes, the opening and the closing of the world, attack cleanly (teeth, lips, the muscled mouth) and finish cleanly ( cut off the air). Stop cleanly. Chew and eat the text. A blind spectator should be able to hear it crunched and swallowing. Mastication, sucking, swallowing. Pieces of text must be bitten off, viciously attacked by the female eaters ( lips, teeth); other pieces must be quickly gulped down, swallowed, gobbled up, breathed in, guzzled. Eat, gulp, eat, chew, dry lung, chew, masticate, cannibal!
title: In The Devil's Kitchen
